data.name: mzspeclib-py
data.description: A python reference implementation of the mzSpecLib spectral library format

evidence: "This is a Python reference implementation of the `mzSpecLib` spectral library format. It provides readers and writers..." (indicates a domain-specific tool for spectral libraries, used directly by researchers).

"Once installed, it can be used programmatically by importing the `mzspeclib` Python library, or using the `mzspeclib` command line tool to read, write, and manipulate spectral libraries." (shows it is an application/CLI and importable library for research tasks).
